capability.name: Customer Campaign Execution
capability.definition: Execute a customer campaign (version) and track and respond to impact
capability.role: Handle the deployment, execution and on-going refinement of a customer campaign. This includes many types of proactive customer campaigns such as up-sell, cross-sell and customer retention. The campaign execution process performs the initial selection and confirmation of candidate customers and includes providing critical feedback on the impact of the campaign to the design unit to support re-calibration and refinement of the specification based on practical experience
capability.example: A bank implements a targeted cross-sell campaign in the customer servicing center to generate additional sales

key_features.name: Candidate customer selection/identification
key_features.description: Enables candidate customer selection/identification to support execute a customer campaign (version) and track and respond to impact

key_features.description: Enables customer interaction and response capture to support execute a customer campaign (version) and track and respond to impact
